verses.verse: A Prayer <S%H8605><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%>. Bow down <S%H5186><s%> thine ear <S%H241><s%>, O LORD <S%H3068><s%>, hear <S%H6030><s%> me: for I am poor <S%H6041><s%> and needy <S%H34><s%>.
Preserve <S%H8104><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%>; for I am holy <S%H2623><s%>: O thou my God <S%H430><s%>, save <S%H3467><s%> thy servant <S%H5650><s%> that trusteth <S%H982><s%> in thee.
Be merciful <S%H2603><s%> unto me, O Lord <S%H136><s%>: for I cry <S%H7121><s%> unto thee daily <S%H3117><s%>.
Rejoice <S%H8055><s%> the soul <S%H5315><s%> of thy servant <S%H5650><s%>: for unto thee, O Lord <S%H136><s%>, do I lift up <S%H5375><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%>.
For thou, Lord <S%H136><s%>, art good <S%H2896><s%>, and ready to forgive <S%H5546><s%>; and plenteous <S%H7227><s%> in mercy <S%H2617><s%> unto all them that call <S%H7121><s%> upon thee.
Give ear <S%H238><s%>, O LORD <S%H3068><s%>, unto my prayer <S%H8605><s%>; and attend <S%H7181><s%> to the voice <S%H6963><s%> of my supplications <S%H8469><s%>.
In the day <S%H3117><s%> of my trouble <S%H6869><s%> I will call <S%H7121><s%> upon thee: for thou wilt answer <S%H6030><s%> me.
Among the gods <S%H430><s%> there is none like unto thee, O Lord <S%H136><s%>; neither are there any works like unto thy works <S%H4639><s%>.

All nations <S%H1471><s%> whom thou hast made <S%H6213><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> and worship <S%H7812><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee, O Lord <S%H136><s%>; and shall glorify <S%H3513><s%> thy name <S%H8034><s%>.
For thou art great <S%H1419><s%>, and doest <S%H6213><s%> wondrous things <S%H6381><s%>: thou art God <S%H430><s%> alone.

Teach <S%H3384><s%> me thy way <S%H1870><s%>, O LORD <S%H3068><s%>; I will walk <S%H1980><s%> in thy truth <S%H571><s%>: unite <S%H3161><s%> my heart <S%H3824><s%> to fear <S%H3372><s%> thy name <S%H8034><s%>.
I will praise <S%H3034><s%> thee, O Lord <S%H136><s%> my God <S%H430><s%>, with all my heart <S%H3824><s%>: and I will glorify <S%H3513><s%> thy name <S%H8034><s%> for evermore <S%H5769><s%>.
For great <S%H1419><s%> is thy mercy <S%H2617><s%> toward me: and thou hast delivered <S%H5337><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> from the lowest <S%H8482><s%> hell <S%H7585><s%>.

O God <S%H430><s%>, the proud <S%H2086><s%> are risen <S%H6965><s%> against me, and the assemblies <S%H5712><s%> of violent <S%H6184><s%> men have sought <S%H1245><s%> after my soul <S%H5315><s%>; and have not set <S%H7760><s%> thee before them.

But thou, O Lord <S%H136><s%>, art a God <S%H410><s%> full of compassion <S%H7349><s%>, and gracious <S%H2587><s%>, longsuffering <S%H750><s%> <S%H639><s%>, and plenteous <S%H7227><s%> in mercy <S%H2617><s%> and truth <S%H571><s%>.

O turn <S%H6437><s%> unto me, and have mercy <S%H2603><s%> upon me; give <S%H5414><s%> thy strength <S%H5797><s%> unto thy servant <S%H5650><s%>, and save <S%H3467><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of thine handmaid <S%H519><s%>.

Shew <S%H6213><s%> me a token <S%H226><s%> for good <S%H2896><s%>; that they which hate <S%H8130><s%> me may see <S%H7200><s%> it, and be ashamed <S%H954><s%>: because thou, LORD <S%H3068><s%>, hast holpen <S%H5826><s%> me, and comforted <S%H5162><s%> me.
